nodes.text: The Rakatan scout ship was a wing shaped starfighter used by the Infinite Empire.

During the Rakatas' expansions into the Deep Core, the Infinite Empire warship Devourer was seemingly lost. This led to Predor Skal'nas dispatching his Force Hound Trill to track down the Force presence of her former brood mate Xesh. As a result, Trill used a Rakatan scout ship as she attempted to track Xesh down to the Force rich world in the Tython system.
